New Records: Nick Castellanos hit his 20th home run of the season
Weston Wilson's infield single was the third-straight game-winning hit for a Philadelphia bench player
Key Match Events: Weston Wilson's tiebreaking infield single in the sixth inning
Nick Castellanos was hit by a pitch in the eighth inning but did not lead to any benches clearing
Pre-Game Insights: The Rays were challenging the Phillies after Nick Castellanos was intentionally hit the previous day
The Phillies were getting production from Triple-A players due to injuries to regulars
Post-Match Reflections: Weston Wilson expressed pride in the team's resilience
The Phillies' magic number to clinch the NL East title was reduced to nine
Miscellaneous Highlights: Several players stepped in for the Phillies due to injuries
Edwin Uceta's suspension was reduced to two games and Kevin Cash apologized for the incident
